review: The Fire Stick works very well however I anticipated being able to do more with it. First of all, since I am a Prime member, I thought I could take advantage of Prime movies. Not so since I am the secondary member. I also thought I could listen to the music stored on my PC by uploading it to Amazon Cloud since I purchased unlimited storage. I can't do that either. I ended up purchasing the Fire Stick, Cloud Storage and Netflix. I didn't need the Fire Stick for Netflix and I could have saved on the Cloud storage too since I have backup for my PC. I guess I should have done a little more research. As far as the TV Stick goes, it works well for looking at my pictures.
